participant_1.background:
I have a lot of fond memories of playing sports with my family and friends when I was younger.
i prefer winter.
I stopped by my local sushi bar on my way home from work to pick up a delicious meal.
my favourite band is rush.
i spend a lot of time driving my kids to sports events.

participant_2.background:
On my last vacation, I went to an arcade and played a lot of games, but I was scared when I saw a clown.
I like to wake up to the smell of fresh-brewed coffee.
it is my universe , and everyone else is just a character in it.
I sometimes neglect my health due to my busy schedule.
i once ran the mile in under 4 minutes.

content.text: I am doing great! I just got back from a vacation to an arcade.
It was a lot of fun! I played a lot of games and ate a lot of junk food.
Sounds like a great time! I love playing arcade games.
Me too! I used to go to arcades all the time when I was younger.
I used to love playing Pac-Man.
Me too! I was really good at it.
I was pretty good at it too!
I remember playing Pac-Man with my friends all the time.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I wish I had friends to play arcade games with.
You can always come over to my house and play some games!
That sounds like a great idea! I would love to play some arcade games with you.
Great! I will see you soon
